abstract.t: This document proposes a new method of identifying iSCSI Nodesbeyond the iSCSI name. The new method uses a 64-bit field to becompatible with technologies using 64-bit identifiers such as EUI-64.These technologies include Fibre Channel and Infiniband, but may alsoextend to storage features such as failover, LUN-level masking or storage asset management.
